note.p: Birth: New York, United States (01 December 1853)
Education: Trinity College, Cambridge. MA (1879) DSc (1886)

Career: His family had lived for some time in America when he was born, then returned to England; Lecturer in Physiology, Cambridge; Assistant Tutor, Gonville and Caius College, Cambridge; suffered from a progressive spinal disease
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1915-1917 vol 89 pp xxv-xxvii signed by J N L
